constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 33 (Friday, February 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COHEN:
H.R. 6761.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1132]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require certain Tennessee Valley Authority employees to include their annual salary in annual disclosure reports, and for the other purposes.
